data.title: Croatian radio and television channels
data.meta_description: Here you can find basic information about Croatian radio and television channels
data.text:
Here you can find basic information about Croatian radio and television channels, with direct links.

Hrvatska Radiotelevizija (HRT)

Description: This is the website of the public television and radio broadcaster. It operates national networks.

Language: Croat

Visit the website of Hrvatska Radioteleizija (in Croat)

RTL Televizija

Description: This is the website of one of the main private television networks. It operates on a national level.

Language: Croat

Visit the website of RTL Televizija (in Croat)

Otvoreni Radio

Description: This is the website of one of the main private radios of the country. It operates nationwide.

Language: Croat

Visit the website of Otvoreni Radio (in Croat)

Narodni Radio
